entry.title: mpeters/cgi--application--mailpage
entry.summary: Perl - simple mail page application written in CGI::Application

entry.title: maxmind/MaxMind-DB
entry.summary:
Spec and test data for the MaxMind DB file format

MaxMind DB is a binary file format that stores data indexed by IP address subnets (IPv4 or IPv6).

This repository contains the spec for that format.

entry.title: binary-com/perl-FIX-Parser
entry.summary:
A module to parse FIX market data.

perl-FIX-Parser

A module to parse FIX market data. Currently supports FIX 4.4.

Installation

To install this module, run the following commands:

perl Makefile.PL
make
make test
make install

Example

use FIX::Parser::FIX44;

my $parser = FIX::Parser::FIX44->new;

my @msgs = $parser->add($fix_msg);

for(@msgs) {
	print "Symbol: ".$_->{symbol}."\n";
        
	print "Bid: ".$_->{bid}."\n";
	print "Ask: ".$_->{ask}."\n";
	print "Datetime: ".$_->{datetime}."\n";
}
